summary: Adds a standalone armor based on Forsworn and savior's hide models.
descriptionHtml: My first publicly released mod, it was requested by eatfist while I was working on some larger projects so here it is. It's a pretty simple mod that adds in a new standalone set of armor. The new armor can be found under the hide category and is mostly intended for use at higher levels. It uses the savior's hide armor, as well as forsworn boots and a retextured version of the forsworn bracers and stormcloak bear hat. Currently only supports male men and elves. Yes you can temper it as well! All done with vanilla meshes and textures. Credit for the screenshots goes to eatfist as well.Â
author: ArchdukeofLandsee
